name: Maimai DX Prism
summary:
The sixth release of maimai DX.

General Information / Changes:
Several changes were made to the Area progression system:
- Area distance is now calculated and displayed all at once at the end of the credit, as opposed to after each track.
- SYNC PLAY/FULL COMBO/ALL PERFECT/FULL SYNC bonuses apply to all songs in a credit once achieved, with the highest bonus taking priority.
- Selecting a song in the Song Bonus category now applies the bonus to all songs played in that credit.
- If you reach a task track or Perfect Challenge and can no longer progress, you will get the full distance of that credit by clearing the aforementioned track any time within that credit.
- Maximum distance stocked for an Area is increased from 99km to 999km.

Stamp Card selection screen will be skipped until you collect all the stamps on a Stamp Card.

All achieved tour member awakenings will be displayed at once, as opposed to once per tour member.

Random Select now added to the Favorites category.

Songs are now ordered in categories oldest to newest by release date.

All maimile collected in maimai でらっくす BUDDiES PLUS will be reset to 0.
- Weekly Area progress 2x and Tour Member level up 5x tickets will transfer over, as will all non-removed Stamp Cards.

First verison without a Start Area at Launch.
- Endless Area is unlocked by default.

New game mode added: KALEIDXSCOPE.
- Allows players to unlock exclusive songs once certain conditions are met, similar to PANDORA BOXXX.
